title: ATP Washington D.C – De Minaur vs. Nakashima
description:
This is a polymarket on the quarterfinal match between Alex de Minaur and Brandon Nakashima in the 2025 ATP Washington D.C. men’s singles tournament, scheduled for July 25, 2025.

This market will resolve to “De Minaur” if Alex de Minaur advances against Brandon Nakashima.
This market will resolve to “Nakashima” if Brandon Nakashima advances against Alex de Minaur.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 27, 2025, this market will resolve to 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

title: # of views of next MrBeast video on day 1?
description:
This market will resolve to according to the number of views the next YouTube video posted by MrBeast gets in the first 24hrs after being posted. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If MrBeast does not post a YouTube video by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "<30m".

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

The resolution source for this market is MrBeast's YouTube channel, specifically the 'views' counter for the described video.

Note: This market refers to MrBeast's announced next video posted. Shorts, previews, or other videos released other than the referenced video will not be considered.

title: Will Israel raid Gaza aid ship Handala by Monday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israeli military or law enforcement personnel physically board the vessel Handala, without authorization or consent from the crew or organizers, by July 28, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No."

Escorting, shadowing, or issuing warnings without boarding does not count. Boarding with the crew’s consent also will not count.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

title: Boxing – Salt Papi vs. Tony Ferguson
description:
This is a polymarket on whether Salt Papi or Tony Ferguson will win their upcoming boxing match, scheduled for August 30, 2025.

This market will resolve to "Salt Papi" if Salt Papi is declared the winner of this match.
This market will resolve to "Ferguson" if Tony Ferguson is declared the winner of this match.

If the fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after September 30, 2025 at 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be the official event broadcast and result. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

title: Will Trump attend Hulk Hogan's funeral?
description:
This polymarket will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump attends Hulk Hogan's funeral. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the event is canceled, postponed beyond or otherwise doesn't take place by August 7, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

Attending the event is defined as being in physical attendance during any part of the event.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

title: Will Ghislaine Maxwell cut a deal with the Feds by August 31?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ghislaine Maxwell is granted a sentence reduction, transfer to a less restrictive facility, or any other formal legal benefit by the U.S. federal government in connection with cooperation or information she provides to U.S. authorities by August 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

Qualifying cooperation may include providing testimony, depositions, or other information to federal prosecutors, law enforcement agencies, or Congress. The benefit must be explicitly linked to such cooperation, either through government statements or a consensus of credible reporting.

Examples of qualifying benefits include but are not limited to:
- A sentence reduction via Rule 35(b) or similar motion
- A transfer to a lower-security facility tied to cooperation
- Entry into witness protection

A presidential commutation or pardon, will qualify regardless of if directly attributed to cooperation. 

Changes to her confinement not clearly tied to cooperation will not count. 

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

title: Bolivia Chamber of Deputies Election Winner
description:
General elections are scheduled to take place in Bolivia on 17 August 2025.

This market will resolve to the political party that wins the greatest number of seats in the Chamber of Deputies of Bolivia.

If voting in the next Bolivia election for the Chamber of Deputies does not occur by January 31, 2026, this market will resolve to "Other".

In the case of a tie between this party and any other for the most seats won, this market will resolve in favor of the party whose listed abbreviation comes first in alphabetical order.

This market's resolution will be based solely on the number of seats won by the named party or coalition.

This market will resolve based on the result of the election as indicated by a consensus of credible reporting. If there is ambiguity, this market will resolve based solely on the official results as reported by the Bolivian government, specifically the Plurinational Electoral Body (Órgano Electoral Plurinacional, OEP) (https://www.oep.org.bo/).

title: ATP Washington D.C – Shelton vs. Tiafoe
description:
This is a polymarket on the quarterfinal match between Ben Shelton and Frances Tiafoe in the 2025 ATP Washington D.C. men’s singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Shelton” if Ben Shelton advances against Frances Tiafoe.
This market will resolve to “Tiafoe” if Frances Tiafoe advances against Ben Shelton.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

title: Ethereum Up or Down on July 27?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 26 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 27 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 26 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 27 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 27 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 28 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

title: Highest temperature in London on July 27?
description:
This market will resolve to the temperature range that contains the highest temperature recorded at the London City Airport Station in degrees Fahrenheit on 27 Jul '25.

The resolution source for this market will be information from Wunderground, specifically the highest temperature recorded for all times on this day by the Forecast for the London City Airport Station once information is finalized, available here: https://www.wunderground.com/history/daily/gb/london/EGLC.

This market can not resolve to "Yes" until all data for this date has been finalized.

The resolution source for this market measures temperatures to whole degrees Fahrenheit (eg, 21°F). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market.

Any revisions to temperatures recorded after data is finalized for this market's timeframe will not be considered for this market's resolution.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the ETH/USDT 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
